import React from"react";import{useEffect}from"react";import{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"../PrayerTrack.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SetPrayerStatus(_ref){let{dateSelected}=_ref;const[prayerData,setPrayerData]=useState({userId:0,dashboardId:0,prayerName:"",date:"",dateTime:"",status:""});const handleChange=e=>{const{id,value}=e.target;// setPrayerData({...prayerData,[id]:value})
setPrayerData({...prayerData,prayerName:id,status:value});};const handleClick=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post("https://localhost:7221/Prayer/PrayerSetStatus",{userId:1,dashboardId:1,prayerName:prayerData.prayerName,date:dateSelected,dateTime:"2023-12-20T06:00:29.539Z",status:prayerData.status});if(response.status===200){alert("Successful");}else{alert("Signup failed: ${response.data}");}}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);alert('Please try again.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"prayer-checkboxes",children:["Fajr","Zuhr","Asr","Maghrib","Isha"].map(prayer=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[prayer,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:prayer,onChange:handleChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Unfilled",children:"Set Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Completed",children:"Prayed"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Missed",children:"Missed"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClick,className:"save-button",children:"save"})]},prayer))});}export default SetPrayerStatus;
